    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(User user,
                  PhotoAlbum album,
                  Photo photo)
        Loads photo and photo details onto page.
        Parameters:
        user - user that owns album and photo
        album - album where photo is located
        photo - photo that is to be displayed

      • buttonAction

        public void buttonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Allows a user to caption/recaption and add a tag

        Tag: a user can add a tag if both text fields of the tag name and tag value are filled. A user cannot add a duplicate tag to a photo.

        Caption: a user can caption/recaption a photo if the caption textfield is filled.

        Parameters:
        e - event from tag and caption button.

      • remove

        public void remove(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Allows a user to remove a tag from a photo.
        Parameters:
        e - event from when the user selects the "remove tag" menuitem

      • slide

        public void slide(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Allows a user to manually go through photos in an album.
        Parameters:
        e - event from the next and previous button.

      • returnToAlbumPage

        public void returnToAlbumPage(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Allows a user to return to the photoalbum page
        Parameters:
        e - event from the return button
